sentence.text: Several myotubularins have been genetically linked to human diseases: protein dephosphorylation is mutated in the congenital myopathy X-linked centronuclear or myotubular myopathy (XLCNM) and MTMR14 (JUMPY) has been linked to an autosomal form of such disease, while phosphatidylinositol dephosphorylation and myelination are mutated in Charcot-Marie-Tooth (CMT) neuropathies.
